title: European iOS developers can begin testing alternative app stores
description:
Apple this week began implementing its controversial plans to comply with the EU’s Digital Markets Act (DMA), allowing developers to now submit alternative app stores and external apps via App Store Connect. This development comes amid Apple’s efforts to meet the DMA requirements by March 2024. With the deadline looming, Apple is taking proactive steps... Read more »

The post European iOS developers can begin testing alternative app stores  appeared first on Developer Tech News.
